name: Oracle Of Doom
flavor: A towering immortal and incarnation of fate, cursed to only see bad outcomes.

features.name: Terrifying - Passive
features.desc: When the Oracle makes a successful attack, all PCs within Far range lose a Hope and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Walls Closing In - Passive
features.desc: When a creature rolls a failure while within Very Far range of the Oracle, they must mark a Stress.

features.name: Pronounce Fate - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to present a target within Far range with a vision of their personal nightmare. The target must make a Knowledge Reaction Roll. On a failure, they lose all Hope and take 2d10+4 direct magic damage. On a success, they take half damage and lose a Hope.

features.name: Summon Tormentors - Action
features.desc: Once per day, spend 2 Fear to summon 2d4 Tier 2 or below Minions relevant to one of the PCâ€™s personal nightmares. They appear at Close range relative to that PC.

features.name: Ominous Knowledge - Reaction
features.desc: When the Oracle sees a mortal creature, they instantly know one of their personal nightmares.

features.name: Vengeful Fate - Reaction
features.desc: When the Oracle marks HP from an attack within Very Close range, you can mark a Stress to knock the attacker back to Far range and deal 2d10+4 physical damage.
